alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 11:16AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief break between weather systems is expected Tuesday night.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
